content.description:
Directions: Read the following selection carefully for comprehension. The selection is followed by a number of questions. For each question, choose the response that is best according to the selection.

This selection was originally published in Corriere della Sera Magazine in July 2007.
content.question: Quale caratteristica della stampante sottolinea la pubblicità?

choices.label: Il fatto che non riscalda l’ambiente
La sua utilità per vari tipi di lavoro

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
